sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import { Input, CreateField, TaskFormInput,ContactFormInput } from "../../assetss/common/ValidatorsComponents/ElementsValidators"; import {MaxLengthCreator, required} from "../../utils/validators"; import ts from "./Tasks.module.css"; import GoBackButton from "../GoBackButton"; const maxlength50 = MaxLengthCreator(50) const maxlength100 = MaxLengthCreator(100) const TaskEditForm = (props) => { return
Task title : {CreateField("title", "title", [required,maxlength50], ContactFormInput)}
Completed? {CreateField("completed", "completed", [], "input", {type: "checkbox"})}
Start date : {CreateField("must be like 11/01/2019", "startDate", [maxlength50], ContactFormInput,{type : "date"})}
deadline : {CreateField("must be like 11/11/2019", "deadline", [maxlength50], ContactFormInput,{type : "date"})}
description : {CreateField("description", "description", [maxlength100], ContactFormInput)}
} export default TaskEditForm
